public void printPermutations(int[] data, int n, int k) {
  if (k == 1) {
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      System.out.print(data[i] + " ");
    }
    System.out.println();
  }

  for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i) {
    int tmp = data[i];
    data[i] = data[k-1];
    data[k-1] = tmp;

    printPermutations(data, n, k - 1);

    tmp = data[i];
    data[i] = data[k-1];
    data[k-1] = tmp;
  }
}

public class CellDivision {


public int count(int n){

public int division(int n){
if(n==0){

}

public int die(int n){
if(n < 3){
return 0;
}

return division(n-3);

System.out.println(count(3));

function f(time,i0,i1,i2){
i0 = i0 || 1;
i1 = i1 || 0;
i2 = i2 || 0;

if(time == 0){
return i0 + i1 + i2;
}

return f(time - 1, (i1 + i2) << 1,i0,i1);
}

return divsion(n, i, num);

public static int count(int hour) {
if (hour <= 1) {
return 1;
} else if (hour == 2) {
return 2;
}
return (int) Math.pow(2, hour - 1) - (int) Math.pow(2, hour - 3);
}

public static int fn(int hour) {
int value = 1;
for (int i = 1; i < hour; i++) {
int currValue = count(hour);
value = fn(hour - 1) + currValue;
}

return value;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(fn(5));
}

static int num(int n) {
int m = a2(n) + a1(n) + a0(n);
return m;
}

static int a2(int n) {
if (n >= 1)
return a1(n - 1);
else
return 0;
}

static int a1(int n) {
if (n >= 1)
return a0(n - 1);
else
return 0;
}

static int a0(int n) {
if (n >= 1)
return a2(n - 1) + a1(n - 1) + a0(n - 1);
else
return 1;
}
